## Models of data

{{< fa regular square-check >}} data cleaning  
{{< fa regular square-check >}} data munging  
{{< fa regular square-check >}} smoothing, etc

<br>

```python
# exclude rows with missing values
df.dropna()
# resample into daily freq, take average, and forward fill gaps
df.resample('D').mean().ffill()
# 7-day running average
df.rolling(7, center=True).mean()
```
